CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?
CTR.A: This chart is a {stacked area chart}.

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stacked area chart?

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total organic farming area?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Sunstone Farms}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total organic farming area?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Golden Harvest Cooperative}.

VE.Q: What is Sunstone Farms's Organic Farming Area in 1979?
VE.A: Sunstone Farms's organic farming area in 1979 is {1059.06} hectares.

VE.Q: What is Starfall Organics's Organic Farming Area in 1983?
VE.A: Starfall Organics's organic farming area in 1983 is {1138.49} hectares.

VE.Q: What is Golden Harvest Cooperative's Organic Farming Area in 1978?
VE.A: Golden Harvest Cooperative's organic farming area in 1978 is {982.18} hectares.

VE.Q: What are the organic farming area of Sunstone Farms, Golden Harvest Cooperative, and Starfall Organics in 1987?
VE.A: Sunstone Farms's organic farming area is {1833.44} hectares, Golden Harvest Cooperative's organic farming area is {186.37} hectares, Starfall Organics's organic farming area is {1217.66} hectares.

EVJ.Q: What is the global minimum total Organic Farming Area in the stacked area chart?
EVJ.A: The global minimum total organic farming area is {2428.80} hectares.

EVJ.Q: What is the global maximum total Organic Farming Area in the stacked area chart?
EVJ.A: The global maximum total organic farming area is {3808.51} hectares.

SC.Q: What is the average height of Starfall Organics's Organic Farming Area area?
SC.A: The average height of Starfall Organics's organic farming area area is {1007.29} hectares.

SC.Q: What is the average height of Sunstone Farms's Organic Farming Area area?
SC.A: The average height of Sunstone Farms's organic farming area area is {1561.21} hectares.

SC.Q: What is the average height of Golden Harvest Cooperative's Organic Farming Area area?
SC.A: The average height of Golden Harvest Cooperative's organic farming area area is {544.15} hectares.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Organic Farming Area fall between 2982 and 3296 hectares? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
NF.A: total value was {3080.72} hectares in {1981}, total value was {3266.06} hectares in {1984}, total value was {3237.47} hectares in {1987}.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Organic Farming Area exceed 3385 hectares? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
NF.A: total value was {3516.77} hectares in {1978}, total value was {3476.30} hectares in {1983}, total value was {3808.51} hectares in {1992}.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Organic Farming Area go below 2892 hectares? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
NF.A: total value was {2428.80} hectares in {1986}, total value was {2702.17} hectares in {1989}, total value was {2468.98} hectares in {1979}.

NC.Q: Was the total Organic Farming Area in 1977 higher or lower than in 1981?
NC.A: The total organic farming area in {1977} was {lower} than in {1981}.

NC.Q: Between 1978 and 1984, did the total Organic Farming Area experience a larger or smaller change than between 1985 and 1992?
NC.A: The change in total organic farming area between {1978} and {1984} was {smaller} than between {1985} and {1992}.

NC.Q: Between 1986 and 1990, did the total Organic Farming Area experience a larger or smaller change than between 1983 and 1988?
NC.A: The change in total organic farming area between {1986} and {1990} was {smaller} than between {1983} and {1988}.

NC.Q: Between 1984 and 1988, was the average total Organic Farming Area higher or lower than between 1977 and 1978?
NC.A: The average total organic farming area between {1984} and {1988} was {lower} than between {1977} and {1978}.
